meanings.definition: To lead or contribute to a particular result or effect.
meanings.sent1: Hard work can conduce to success in school.
meanings.sent2: Eating healthy food can conduce to a strong body.
meanings.sent3: His habit of reading before bed conduced to many interesting dreams.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's guidance conduced the students towards academic excellence.
meanings.sent5: Positive thinking can conduce to a happier life.

meanings.definition: To be conducive or helpful to a particular outcome.
meanings.sent1: Studying regularly can conduce to better grades.
meanings.sent2: A peaceful environment can conduce to relaxation.
meanings.sent3: The cozy atmosphere of the cafe conduced to a pleasant conversation.
meanings.sent4: The clear instructions conduced to a smooth assembly of the furniture.
meanings.sent5: Good communication skills can conduce to successful relationships.
